about_the_game:
In Alien Outpost you play as a lone space soldier stationed at a remote outpost on the edge of the galaxy. When a sudden and overwhelming alien invasion strikes, it's up to you to defend your post against relentless hordes of invasive extraterrestrials. Armed with an arsenal of futuristic weaponry and utilizing the outpost's defenses, you must hold your ground and prevent the outpost from being overrun. With each wave of alien attackers growing more formidable, your survival skills and combat prowess will be pushed to the limit

This adrenaline-pumping 2.5D twin-stick shooter places you at a remote outpost besieged by relentless waves of alien invaders. Navigate through the intricately detailed environment with smooth, immersive 2.5D graphics, unleashing a barrage of firepower as you fend off extraterrestrial threats from every direction

Feature:
• Permadeath Mechanic: Experience intense, high-stakes gameplay where death is permanent, making every decision crucial.
• 30 Unique Weapons: Equip yourself with a diverse arsenal of 30 futuristic weapons,
• Environmental Hazards: Navigate through treacherous terrain and avoid environmental hazards that can be as deadly as the aliens
• Procedurally Generated Levels: Encounter a new challenge every time with procedurally generated levels that keep the game play fresh and unpredictable.
• Boss Battles: Confront powerful alien bosses that require strategic thinking and precise execution to defeat.
